review: this is one of the best turn based rpg i have ever played
fun turn based combat with great story and a very polished world
if only more games were heartfelt loveletters with their own ideas and great execution
an ode to old school jrpgs done right great story with great gameplay makes it an easy recommendation to anyone
good game
excellent jrpg with novel yet familiar mechanics
gg keren harusnya og

this is an excellent oldstyle rpg  similar to chronotrigger or breath of fire but with some nice modern elements there are many nice mechanics and systems in the game that will be engaging for rpg fans the plot writing story and animation are topclass i found lots of side quests endgame bosses ultimate weapons and other completionist content to keep me coming back for more its a 55 for me

very fun good story great art amazing gameplay  the only downside is the early sky armor combat on the hardest difficulty it felt very frustrating because you mainly had to rely on good rng for enemy moves

if youre a fan of classic rpgs this game will feel like coming home the story is full of charm and emotion with characters and moments that really stick with you the gameplay is fun and keeps things freshyoull often lose track of time doing side quests that actually feel worth it some bosses can be tough but beating them is super satisfying and makes you feel like you really earned it overall its a great mix of story adventure and challenge thats hard to put down
amazing
peak

if youve never had an rpg click with you this might not be the one that does but for fans of the genre this should be a classic alongside some of the best the genre has ever had to offer i rarely get sucked into story but i was fully along for the ride once the hooks started sinking in cant wait for the dlc and next projects

this is a great game beautiful graphics interesting characters and a competent battle system  probably not the game for you if youre looking for something challenging  with that being said i feel like more could have been done with the narrative in places particularly at the start of the second act and as much as i like the game i hate one aspect of the ending
this is a very good game
for a solo dev this a good game
this scratched the classical jrpg itch i had and with a fresh and more darker story than your typical jrpg good game for those that are seeking what i mentioned above with an enjoyable battle system
nice

really nice quality of life improvements to the typical turn based rpg and it has some fun mechanics with sky armor  the story was good but not great  ill probably play through it a 2nd time at some point since i enjoyed how combat is structured
very fun
put off playing this when it came out because it lacked 219 aspect ratio boy was i an idiot grabbed it on sale and one that ive finished the story its in my top 10 all time
so far its one of the best games ive ever played im basically blown away lets see where were at passed 40  hours
cfg such a good tribute to the 90s jrpgs i cant recommend it enough   chrono fantasy gear is the closest title i can make explain it but this even the tip of the iceberg
one of the best games ive played in 2025 story is amazing
its a very good and fun game

i never wrote a review for this game but i really liked it
a true blast from the past amazing soundtrackclassic turned based combatand great graphicsstory so far is engaging
short kings are canonically best suited for mecha pilot 1010 game

fun game and battle mechanics   hard mode can be extremely challenging  story is serviceable  characters likeable mostly   upgrading equipment gets annoyingly tedious midway through game  overall solid 810 game
great game
very fun game i have been playing it for hours
simple and intresting game play  story is top notch  it has mature themes but not overly verbose  gem of a game  highly recommend to rpg fans
everything i you could want in a old school jrpg with some new twist
this game is amazing  really challenging and complex i enjoyed almost every part of it  good job cant wait for the dlc
great old school rpg really soaked a lot of time on this game

the art and music are the kings of this castle this has game has style for days the on foot combat was very fun in the early and game but became a bit bland towards the end i wish some of the other skills you unlocked were actually worth using sky armor combat was cool but pretty uninteresting heres hoping they improve upon it for their next game  despite its shortcomings this is solid rpg that i would recommend to any oldschool fan
this is the gold standard on new rpgs
this game is so fkin good
funnn
good 8510 hoponestly tanking a bit after expedition 33 but it was a good rpg lost of party building and customization i wish you had a bit more options but it was otherwise good
a truly excellent game not perfect but very memorable lots of options great side quests and amazing twists and turns absolutely worth planning for an rpg fan

do you know chrono trigger from snes this is to 100inspired by it but in the best way possible story and music are great the fighting system is expanded by many modern systems and offers more complexity than its role model 100 recommandation

reasonablysized jrpg that feels like a love letter to the greats of the genre checks all the boxes including fun characters with meaningful side stories and dialogue an enticing yet believable world solid combat and an overall compelling story  please play chained echoes

came here straight after expedition 33 this game is really good so far 7 hours in  the overdrive system if not managed well is a bit daunting initially especially for a newbie to the genre only me maybe but i am definitely hooked to the narrative and the combat system overall hard to believe it was a one person project highly recommended for anyone who loves jrpgs

excellent oldschool jrpg with some innovative features  my favorite being the progression system that completely removes the need for level grinding without sacrificing character customization  what makes it truly amazing is the fact that it was produced by just one person
great game if youre looking for a harder jrpg

took a lil bit for the story really to grab me but once it did i was locked in gorgeous art great soundtrack really interesting turn based combat and a really lovely nuanced story that manages to turn a lot of jrpg tropes on their heads highly recommend for anyone looking for a solid turn based jrpg style game
great rpg for those who enjoy the old school jrpgs from the snesps1 era im looking forward to the dlc coming out soon
holy crap as a big old rpg fan this was so much fun the turnbased combat system is familiar but theres a little bit of a unique spin on everything youre familiar with from the classic jrpgs out there
a charming game that takes you back to the gbads era of rpg and truly leaves you with a lasting impression 1010

amazing story art and soundtrack the story and all of the characters are well written and the gameplay is fun theres a mix of new and old rpg mechanics that make the game fun and engaging this is one of the the games that will go down in my memory as having an amazing story that i will think of often i will recommend this game to everyone i talk to if you are thinking about getting this game stop thinking about it and get it
it feels like a tribute to xenogears the story could use a bit more work and i didnt like the ending overall a fun game i enjoyed
1010  more or less the perfect rpg hard to find anything that may be improved
perfect game for retro style jrpg lovers if you loved crono triggersea of stars you will like this
story of chained of echoes is well written it reminds me a bit of final fantasy gameplay is also top notch recommended
loved it

an absolute gem of a game  i enjoyed the story the characters the worldbuilding and especially the gameplay  1010  my only problem with it is that its a bit too easy though i was only playing on the default difficulty settings and was too much of a coward to turn up the difficulty  one thing i will say i loved was that status effects were actually useful even on bosses a rarity in games
adore this game
good
scratches a specific itch from a long time ago feels like i should be playing this on a snes early on a saturday morning worth the price give it a try
solid game reminds me of the classic rpgs of the snesgenesis era but in a modernized form definitely worth playing
cried
its a little tedious but still good
amazing game the story really made you feel like you were in the world as well as the plot twists were crazy
immersive story fantastic combat system overworld is cool mechanics aesthetics and overall gameplay is a solid 10 must play

fantastic rpg with clear inspiration from games like chrono trigger  fun and engaging combat good customization interesting characters good graphics overall fun appeal  only negative i have is that while the story is okay its quite convoluted and very rushed in specific areas
this game is a tad edgelordy and cringe but ill be damned if it isnt fun and sincere as well
great game had a lot of fun play it
i mean  is it on par with the greats ehhh no not really but its decent  its doin a lot better than most indie jrpgs that are a love letter to the snes  its generally solid and id check out a sequel
peak

great game farming crystals to make the ultimate weaponsarmor isnt necessary  i beat the ultimate boss and then the game with only tier 8 equip very fun game and the story wasnt cliche or boring it definitely pays homage to snes and ps1 jrpgs which is a treat for us 35
turnbased combat gameplay is great it has twist on it making sure all of the skills are utilized i will enjoy this for sure
nice

a really interesting and well told story in my opinion the only thing i didnt really like is all the passages which are blocked due to the storyline progression  would rate it 95 out of 10 very nice good  old rpg
favorite pixel game of all time

the battle system takes a bit of time to get down and i frown on the drive by tutorials however the game is not a grind you should explore every corner before pushing the story forward though and then the story the story is better than most aaa games  the director was cooking this one up
its good dont know why i refunded it its more story based
its peak
overall great story and rpg mechanics definitely up there with sea of stars and other pixel rpgs
crystal system can be a bit too much and unnecessary sometimes but story is interesting and combat is fun
yes

i would like to give my heartfelt thanks to matthias linda for this absolute gem of a game truly thank you i havent played anything so fulfilling in many years and i cant wait to see more beyond the dlc keep making games matthias
love letter to classic snes jrpgs with a unique setting and combat system well worth your time

pros  great story  great combat system  best ever life quality aspect  fun exploration  cheap literallly a steal  snappy gameplay  cons  bland character design not the writing  menu navigation can be arranged better  upgrading weapon is such a pain in the ass

unique battle system mechanics that will stop and make you think about your actions and really have you start paying attention to the turn order on the top of the screen  nostalgic in all the right places with cute nods towards past jrpgs and not hey look i made a reference cant say enough good things about this game
pretty neat

a great send of of classic 16 bit jrpgs the story leans a little too heavy on twists for my tastes especially ones where after the twist is revealed im left feeling like that came out of nowhere that said the devs executed really well on the tried formula ragtag group of young folks kill god with the power of friendship in a way that i enjoyed and saw to the end 45

one of the best turn based rpgs ive played in awhile great story and characters i still feel like ive barely scratched the surface and so much has happened also has some great humor thrown in here and there
1110 can pet the dogs and the cats

easily one of my favorite jrpgs everything about this game is quality art story character development music and i especially love the combat system congrats on the dlc and thanks for making such a wonderful game 3
